REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0477 reute u f BC-FOREIGN-INVESTMENT-RI 04-17 0074

TEXT.TITLE: FOREIGN INVESTMENT RISES IN MALAYSIA
TEXT.BODY: Foreign investment in Malaysia in 1986 rose to 524.5 mln ringgit, the highest since 1971, from 324.9 mln in 1985, the Malaysian Industrial Development Authority, MIDA, said. MIDA director-general N. Sadasivan said the increase was due to large investment from the Netherlands in a 180.3 mln ringgit petrochemical project in Bintulu, national news agency Bernama reported. REUTER
